title: Location Context
description: Geographic location data, obtained from GPS, IP geolocation, or user-provided address information.

latitude.description: The latitude coordinate in decimal degrees.

longitude.description: The longitude coordinate in decimal degrees.

accuracy.description: The accuracy of the location in meters.

country.description: The ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code (e.g. US, GB, DE).

region.description: The state, province, or administrative region.

timezone.description: The IANA timezone identifier (e.g. America/New_York, Europe/London).

ipAddress.description: The IP address used for server-side geolocation resolution.
